# CallSegmentFilter

**Properties**

| Name    | Type                    | Required | Description                     |
| :------ | :---------------------- | :------- | :------------------------------ |
| segment | CallSegmentOptions      | ✅       | Call segment for filtering      |
| length  | CallSegmentLengthFilter | ❌       | Duration bounds for the segment |
